macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Ends Week Near Record Highs Following Lower-Than-Expected Inflation Data
items.summary: The S&P 500 gained slightly last week and ended Friday at its high, buoyed by lower-than-expected US inflation data released Thursday. The index remains within reach of its record high after nearly breaking it weeks earlier.

items.title: US Stock Futures Edge Higher as Markets Prepare for Holiday-Shortened Week
items.summary: US stock futures climbed on Sunday evening, December 22, 2025, signaling cautious optimism ahead of a shortened holiday trading week. Oracle and Nvidia showed signs of rebound.

items.title: Silver Delivers Winning Trade as Precious Metals Show Mixed Performance
items.summary: Silver posted a winning trade worth 1.37% following a daily close above $63.57 on Wednesday, while gold failed to set up a trading signal above $4,355.80.

items.title: Key Economic Data and Early Market Closures Scheduled for Holiday Week
items.summary: This week features critical releases including Q3 GDP initial estimate and Q3 PCE inflation data on Wednesday, with US equity markets closing early at 1:00 PM ET on Christmas Eve. European markets will operate on shortened hours or close entirely.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: BEAT Token Surges 31.53% to $2.98 Amid Bitcoin Consolidation
items.summary: BEAT, the native token of the Audiera platform, rose 31.53% to $2.98 in December 2025, outperforming the bearish crypto market where Bitcoin consolidates between $87,000 and $89,000.

items.title: Blockchain Funding Reaches $299M in 18 Deals Over Past Week
items.summary: Blockchain projects raised over $299 million from December 15-22, 2025, with major deals including RedotPay's $107M B-round and Fuse Energy's $70M funding.

items.title: Bitcoin Surpasses $89,000 with 0.79% 24-Hour Gain
items.summary: Bitcoin crossed $89,000 USDT on December 22, 2025, marking a 0.79% increase in 24 hours amid ongoing market consolidation.

items.title: CryptoQuant Confirms Bitcoin Bear Market, Targets $70K Support
items.summary: Blockchain analytics firm CryptoQuant declared Bitcoin in a bear market due to weakening demand and institutional selling, with potential drops to $70,000 or $56,000.

items.title: ICP Rallies 22% Then Slips 8% on AI-No-Code Tool Hype
items.summary: Internet Computer (ICP) surged 22.65% from its $3 support but pulled back 8%, driven by Dfinity Foundation's comments on AI-powered no-code tools for blockchain apps.

items.title: XRP Weakens to $1.915 After Failing to Hold $1.95
items.summary: XRP dropped from $1.926 to $1.915 over 24 hours ending December 22, 2025, following repeated failures to break $1.95 resistance.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Duke University AI Uncovers Simple Rules in Complex Systems
items.summary: Researchers at Duke University developed an AI system that can reduce thousands of variables in complex systems into compact, readable equations. The method works across physics, engineering, climate science, and biology, producing models more than 10 times smaller than previous machine-learning approaches while maintaining accuracy.

items.title: Hybrid Reasoning Emerges as Next Evolution in AI
items.summary: Hybrid reasoning, which combines symbolic AI's rule-based structure with statistical AI's flexibility, is gaining prominence as a solution to reduce hallucinations and improve AI accuracy. The approach offers improved transparency, efficiency, and adaptability across various applications.

items.title: Samsung Unveils AI Vision with Google Gemini Integration at CES 2026
items.summary: Samsung announced an upgraded AI Vision feature for its Bespoke AI Refrigerator Family Hub, now powered by Google Gemini. The enhancement significantly expands food recognition capabilities beyond the previous 37 fresh food and 50 pre-registered processed food items.

items.title: Efficient AI Architectures Reshape Enterprise Deployment
items.summary: Industry experts highlight emerging trends in deep learning including Mixture of Experts (MoE) architectures and parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques like LoRA and quantization, making sophisticated AI more accessible for enterprise applications.

items.title: Concerns Mount Over AI Bubble as Market Concentration Grows
items.summary: Analysis reveals that 75% of S&P 500 returns come from just 41 AI stocks, with the 'magnificent seven' tech companies accounting for 37% of index performance. Critics question whether the mathematical foundations of the AI boom remain sound, citing limitations of current Large Language Models.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Monopoly GO Launches Goblet Run Event with Major Rewards
items.summary: The Goblet Run event on Monopoly GO started at 3 PM ET on December 21, 2025, and runs until 12 PM ET on December 22, 2025, offering players up to 18,205 dice, sticker packs, tokens, cash, and boosts by landing on Tax and Utility tiles.[2][3]

items.title: Fortnite Announces Winterfest 2025 and Ballistic v37.10 Update
items.summary: Fortnite Winterfest 2025 is live, encouraging players to get into the holiday spirit, while the Ballistic v37.10 update adds the Veiled Precision SMG, Deployable Wall Gadget, and more competitive features.[4]

items.title: CNBC Reports Xbox Losing Console Race Amid Microsoft's Gaming Pivot
items.summary: Xbox is significantly trailing in console sales as part of Microsoft's broader shift toward a multi-platform strategy, sparking discussions on challenging PlayStation and Steam dominance.[5]

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Waymo Autonomous Vehicles Freeze and Block Traffic During San Francisco Power Outage
items.summary: Waymo robotaxis halted operations and blocked traffic in San Francisco during a power outage on Sunday, affecting service across at least seven cities in the Bay Area.

items.title: HCLTech Partners with Netherlands’ ASN Bank to Modernize IT Operations
items.summary: HCLTech has partnered with ASN Bank to modernize its IT operations, aligning with the bank’s ‘Simplify and Grow’ strategy and strengthening HCLTech’s presence in the Dutch banking sector.

items.title: Protean eGov Technologies Acquires 4.95% Stake in NSDL Payments Bank for Rs.30.2 Crores
items.summary: Protean eGov Technologies Limited acquired a 4.95% stake in NSDL Payments Bank for Rs.30.2 crores in December 2025.

items.title: PNB Metlife and PolicyBazaar Launch ‘DigiProtect Term Insurance’ for Salaried Individuals
items.summary: PNB Metlife and PolicyBazaar introduced ‘DigiProtect Term Insurance’, a digital term insurance product targeted at India’s salaried individuals.

items.title: SDA Awards Significant Satellite Contract; Blue Origin Conducts Groundbreaking Flight
items.summary: The Space Development Agency (SDA) announced a major satellite award, while Blue Origin achieved a groundbreaking flight, highlighted in the day's space briefing.

items.title: NASA Calls for Artemis Program Review Amid Space Developments
items.summary: NASA has initiated a review of the Artemis program as part of key space sector updates on December 21, 2025.
